name: 2D demon killer kid
description:
I like Family Computer and Super Family Computer.

so I made 2D action game.  Please enjoy it.

How to play 

↑↓→←　up,  down,  right,  left

Z  sword attack

X   slide

C  magic  (press C  for 2 seconds)

space      jump

Esc     pause 

          continue

           quit  

Or  Xbox controller        gamepad

※When you press continue button you must touch save point at first.
